content.detailedDescription:
I was camping, that night, after fishing that day, with 2 other friends. i awoke in the middle of the night, to a "very strange" "loud" unfamiliar sound, i was scared stiff, and scared to even move. once i finally decided to see what was going on, i unzipped tent, and poked my head out to see/hear the most surreal sound & sight, about less than 100 yards away, above the treeline/treetops, it was a "humming/mechanical loud" dull sound, that i remember most, and what i saw, was lights, " shining down word", could not make out much from distance, tress's etc, but know it was very bright, and shinning downward, going past right above the trees tops, methodical, slow, unreal, hairs on back of neck raised. i was stiff with fear, trying to comprehend anything that i could relate to what i was hearing/seeing. i tried to wake others in tent, but to no luck, just "whatever" in response. i have mentioned it over the years, as that i truly believe i saw a ufo. the guys i fished with that trip, still tease me to this day!

we were in a remote part of colorado, & the camping spot we picked out, had no one else around. i can say, without a doubt, the sound & the lights, even though were restricted, my mind put together, that it was "circular" in shape, shining down word & bright from the distance i was from it, max 100 yards, more like 75-100 yards away. like i have stated, the "sound" was the most unnerving part of the experience, not a "helecopter" or anything that could move that slowly, that i can imagine. it was somewhat big, size i recall in my mind trying to comprehend, was like 10-15 yards, i'm using a "football field to judge distance & size, so could be off.

my ride is here, after work, thought i would riffle this off if it had any interest.

sincerely,

brett
content.summary: Low, treeline hovering, circular lights, strange sound "hovering."

content.detailedDescription: I have been a recent advocate of disclosure, the et hypothesis, and a fan of anti gravity technology for a while now but have never seen my own ufo.  last night i was just sitting on my back porch here in chicago when i noticed there were no stars out, except one very bright one.  i stared at it for a while and noticed that it was very slowly moving upward.  it would then remain stationary for a while, then drift very slowly sideways and then move up a bit more.  it was odd because every time that thought to myself, "that could very well be a spaceship" it either seemed to sit still or move again, kind of messing with my head.  i was really hoping it could be but i couldn't be sure if it was just venus or polaris.  hope to see more in the future!  disclosure!!
content.summary: Night time and early morning star object moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend sally noticed the object about 15/20 minutes before me but said nothing until i noticed it. we tracked the object for 40 minutes until the road turned and the object staying stationary, was now behind us and could no longer be visible.
  i have pictures taken of the object a couple of times during the duration of the observation.  
  at first the object seemed closer to the highway when i first noticed it at 7:39 p.M.(perhaps 10 to 20 miles away) but towards the end of the timeframe, seemed much farther away.
  the object was dark, no reflection or lighting of any kind.  a helicopter or plane would have had lights on it and would not be hovering at the same altitude, in the same location for 40 minutes.  
  the object was very large considering the distance and was oblong in shape.  there were no lights of any kind.  when we stopped along the freeway to take the pictures with my digital camera, the object never moved. the object was watched until 8 p.M. even though the sun had set by this time, the object never became "lit".
  i have seen many ufo's but never during daylight and never without lights.

  did anyone else report this? is it common to have reports in the desert between gila bend and yuma of ufo's? please contact me.

location: 100+ miles out of yuma, arizona traveling from gila bend towards yuma.

  i was the passenger, my friend sally was the driver. i first noticed the object because of the vivid "sun dog" that was visible in the sky to the left of the sun. from the first moment i saw the object, i felt that it was a ufo because of the hovering, no lights with the sky continuing to darken as the sun was setting, the duration of the observation and no movement by the object when we stopped to take the digital camera pictures.
  my feelings were of curiosity and to observe as many details as possible to hopefully find out if anyone else saw it.  i have seen many ufo's before, but always at night and with lights. 
  when the highway changed direction, the object was lost from sight due to the object's stationary position.
   photos are available but i don't have internet.
content.summary: Oblong shape over desert between gila bend & yuma, az for 40 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I follow this year the moon and saturn from the back yard so one night i was watching the moon whit a telescope its a normal telescope i begin to watch at 9:15 pm in periods to 11:47 pm i think thats set im goin to sleep tomorrow i work the moon very shine and big that nite i heard some like a air scape from the pipeline showsss then in look over my head and and in see the three red lights at the first i thinking to my self hoo that stars are very shine and i say why i dont see before then i grab the tele but wen i see more i look the three lights are movin to the center of the city very slow in call  to my soon heey cmon and lock at this sonny telme you see the same its a red lights in a triangle and he say yes i see the lghts focus whit the tele but o cant because its dificult to focus in movement so i see in the midlee of the lights a cover or something but that cover dont let you see in the midlee you can see the lights but not in the midlee you can a r���flex of the sky i think because i try hard to see in the midlee and i see some like a invisible cover or some then a mnts later disaper in a sec of time fuooff no more red lights and that month i see lights in the sky like a star but movin faster many that month.                            
tnks
and look at the sky.
content.summary: Triangle over my home three red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a break on the deck of my house and suddenly appeared in the sky a luminous object shaped like a cigar.
its color was red and orange, varying slowly, performing a vertical movement of ascent and descent, the vertical movement was little, no more than half inch.
your size was about a finger major mine, about 3 inches.
there was no horizontal movement.
appeared in the south west and could see it over the trees on my house, i figure that the elevation was about 30 degrees.
the sky was completely overcast, and looked underneath the clouds. 
did not deliver sound.
everything happened in about 10 seconds, and then disappeared.
i regret not being able to provide more information on this sighting, but it was the first time that happens and i really surprised me.
my first impression was curiosity, then to realize that it was not a plane was surprise but not fear, do not feel scared at any time and when the object disappeared special feeling of joy felt by the experience.
content.summary: Unknown object appears during 10 seconds below the clouds - the sky was cloudy.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to my car and stopped to look at the beautifully clear sky, trying to find saturn.  i saw one shooting star and as i was looking at a patch of sky in the opposite direction, a "star" i was looking at grew extremely bright (10-20x brighter than venus) and then faded quickly and "went out".  i suppose it could have been a meteor that i was seeing head on (as it did not streak or move as normal shooting stars do).  the only natural phenomenon i have ever seen that was that bright was a fireball meteor, but this just looked like a "star on steroids" for approximately 3-5 seconds.  i believe i was facing ne at the time.  if you saw what i saw, or maybe got a better glimpse, please let me know!

p.S.  i am an amateur astonomer and avid ufo hunter. i know what shooting stars look like, i live in the city, so i know the flight paths of incoming aircraft, and i know where all the planets are.  this was a "ufo" in the purest sense of the term.
content.summary: Star-gazing on a clear night. a particular star i was looking at glowed very bright, and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Parked in chesterfield valley off 109 to star gaze for a few minutes. beautiful evening-slight breeze ~65 degrees. some clouds.2/3rds moon. spent time looking westwordly as airport and moon light tend to wash out the sky. noticed an airplane travelin northeast about 1 oclock watched it clear the shy- noticed another  but after they cleared the sky- i saw a star like object moving. it was about 3 oclock in the sky or twelve fingers off the horizon. with a few clouds moving just below this stars elevation - i wanted to check  my vision. i extended my arms placing one hand on top of the other looking at my palms so each finger stacked. just above the twelf finger- was this star- it moved left aproximately the length of my index finger and at 180 degrees it moved back twice that length- the lateral movements were fast- then it moved up like a swimming fish to the center then drifted back down to the original line of sight off the horizon. kind of a triangular pattern or area covered. it did seem to back away from earth or deeper into space for a bit but came right back to this plane. it was colored like a star white with a faint tail that could be eye distortion. it showed more when moving about. it did emit yellow for a moment and at one stop that lazor orange red-it did not change shape- i was hopin it would change into that redball that some of these on film do. not this time.. the clouds started commin in and obscurin the view so i packed up and am extreamly greatful for the glimpse- next nice nite ill spend sometime watchin again.  foot note if some one else saw the same thing- i thought i saw a bar of light to the left of this triangular flight area  two or three times- it looked like a picture of tracer round placed in the sky except white light.  something firing in this things direction?? poor shooting, it appeared the fight pattern distance to the left. also did not continue the trail only  like a picture of one placed in the sky- just a crack of lightbar in the sky. might have been eyeballs playin tricks  as they were workin pretty hard to watch this star move around. would like to have second opinion to verify light bar activity- star movin is factual. ive been watchin a lot of film of ufo activity over the years- im kinda curious if these light balls are life forms themselves or imprints  of activity from another demension touching ours.
content.summary: Star moving with fish in current swimming movements.

content.detailedDescription: I was extremely frightened of event and held a high level of anxiety near the place of incident. i had a "feeling" that would occur at times that would transport me to the incident. as i got older and we moved away from the area i got into meditatiun and wanted to allieviate the neurosis. so i would ask for clarity of the incident and i got way more than i bargained for. it seems that i was taken.I believe the ritual slaying was a screen memory to defer the trauma. there is so much more to the story and quite frankly i am not a good typist. i would like to explore this further.   i have hadd many many experiences throughout the years that were either unexplained or just too weird to share with others for fear of ridicule. there are several where witnesses are involved which is truly the only reason i don't just chuck it all to an exagerated imaginatoin.
content.summary: Daydream of watching ritual slaying of infant and subsequent warnings if told.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard on sunday the 14th, and looked up and noticed a dull greyish, sphere like object  moving across the sky very fast, almost as if it was falling, from s/e to n/w. at first i thought it was a shooting star but there was no trail behind it. then i thought maybe it was a piece of an aircraft or shuttle, but like i said there was nothing behind it and it was moving quickly. i was looking up often because about 15 minutes earlier i saw what looked like a mylar silver balloon, but it was pretty much stationary, when it did move, it moved slowly, like no wind was moving it. the direction of that object was east to west.
content.summary: Noticed a dull greyish object  moving across very fast from s/e to n/w.

content.detailedDescription: In my teens early 1980s saw a ufo from my yard it was over the center of downtown san diego i couldnt have been the only one,bet it was seen by north island and lindberg field eyes and radar!Even after getting my fathers glasses he still wouldnt stop gardening to look.I didnt see it arrive ,move or leave it was already there, but gone 5+ mins later secounds after i found binoculars upstairs.That was scary and when i looked out upper window and could not see it for miles in any direction from over downtown!Fast!200ftwide or so 75ft thick or so not to high over ground 3500ft max.Some what dull silvercolor, football shaped side view probably cirle top/bottom view.I bet more will be seen in future,history channel ufo hunter show had a lady in great lakes say she saw a gray football like ufo with black triangular objects around or under it! scouting was also said.Also less believable same show man walking in forrest in stepenville texas? recently spooked one said it may have been spying on people??No but was probably right on the its empty comment,also it flew away at odd angle+he saw indentations on bottom side, very telling i imagine they could be stacked in cyl/colum or seated/stabalized on those indents when landed at home?I think 99% of sightings are fake or wrong..
content.summary: Silver/gray football large over center of downtown s.D.1000ft+up early 80's.

content.detailedDescription: What i���m about to tell you has left me wondering what it was i witnessed 17 years ago. the incident took place at my then residence, 981 gill ave, oxford michigan in oakland county, on a sunday evening in june 1992 (not clear as to the exact date). at approximately 9:30 pm, my wife (at that time) and our three small children had been watching television in our living room and were now getting ready for bed. there was a storm brewing to the south of us, which was producing a brilliant light show, as summer storms usually do in michigan, i was intrigued by the storm and watched it while my wife got the kids off to bed. i had been watching the storm now for a few minutes when my wife came back into our living room to kiss me goodnight, she wasn���t interested in the storm and went off to bed, i told her i would come to bed in a few minutes. as i continued to watch the storm, i began to notice a glowing white ball of light to the west of the storm, it didn't blink or flicker and it was hovering just above the tree line approximately 3 to 5 miles from my line of sight. my first thought was it must be an airplane or perhaps a helicopter, but after a minute or two i noticed it didn���t move like airplane, it moved a little bit at a time (unlike an airplane), i was thinking it must be a helicopter. i became more fascinated by the ball of white light then the storm and decided to step outside to see if i could get a better look, this is when everything got very strange. first, you must understand that my house sat on the corner of a very busy road (gill st. & drahner road) you can mapquest it, the speed limit on drahner was 45mph, everyone exceeded that! needless to say i was now standing in the middle of drahner rd. watching something that made no sounds, moved very slowly and had no visible shape, just a bright white ball of light floating directly above the tree line and gradually getting closer to me, keep in mind i was walking down the road in the direction of the ball of light which seemed to be wanting me to come closer to it (i know that sounds strange but i felt as if something wanted to observe me, has much as i want to observe it) the ball of light was directly above me now at a distance of maybe 20��� to 25���, at this time i had also noticed i was clearly farther away from my house a good 35��� to 40��� away, i had walked down the middle of a busy road, didn���t see one car, didn���t hear one sound, not even a breeze, i observed the light for maybe two or three minutes from this position, i was feeling a bit terrified now because i knew this wasn���t a helicopter, and it definitely wasn���t a plane. the light was very bright and it was impossible to make out any kind of shape. it slowly moved up and over the trees and that was the last i saw of it. i then realized i was a good distance from my house, in my pj���s, in the middle of drahner road, and still absolutely silent. i immediately turned around and began to run back to the house, i got back into the house and noticed it was now around 11pm. i ran down the hallway to our bedroom and woke my wife, i tried to explain i just saw something weird in the sky and needed her to witness it. she came reluctantly to the kitchen, where we looked out the back window, there wasn���t anything in the sky for her to see, i told her i had just witnessed something i couldn���t explain, she told me, ���go back to bed you���ve been dreaming���. i didn���t sleep that night, not after that. i don���t know what it was i saw, it wasn���t a plane or a helicopter that much i know. i put this incident behind me, but for whatever reason it���s been in my thoughts for a few months now. i have a new wife and family and reside in arizona, i���m a broadcast engineer for a satellite corporation, my wife is a second grade school teacher, we have two young children together, i don���t use drugs, i don���t drink, and didn���t when i had the sighting, i just have the urge to tell someone about this. i wish i had called the police, fire department or someone official when this happened to me, maybe someone else saw it besides me. this was my experince.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright ball of light june 1992.

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought it was a shooting star but it was way too big and bright. it lit up the sky like lightning and had a radius of one inch and appeared to be like  pizza with-ought a slice. it moving south west really fast and then disappeared.
content.summary: Giant shooting star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming out of a friends house at about 12:30am early morning on sunday, june 14th 2009. we had just finished up our weekly band practice and as i was walking to my truck i glanced up to look at the clear night sky and noticed what i believed to be the 'little dipper' and at that instant i saw a flash of white light, kind of like a photo flash. thinking it was a high alltitude plane i kept watching for more lights but didn't see another flash until 5 or 6 seconds later.
     to give you a perspective of my point of view, as i look at the little dipper, the handel is to my left and the cup is to my right. the first flash i saw was a dime at arms length away to the right of the top edge of the cup. the next flash happened directly next to and underneath the handle but the third flash was a quarter at arms length away and above from where the handle and the cup meet, so basicaly this thing back tracked to form a triangular flight pattern and all three flashes were about 5-6 seconds apart and were "flashes" not "streaks".
     at this point i got the attention of two of my band mates to watch these flashes of light but we only saw one more that was about 12 inches to the left at arms length away from where i saw the last one. there was no noise and the sky was very clear.
content.summary: Four flashes about 5-6 seconds apart.

content.detailedDescription: I decide to go out on the balcony to have a smoke break and about half way through the smoke i get this feeling of something above me, like the feeling of someone moving up behind you very stealthily. so i look up and i see one light moving i would say about 25 - 35 mph over head about 3/4 as high as a helicopter would fly over usually as the do pretty often. this was no helicopter so i leaned out and looked up and this object was low enough were i could see it's outline and the lights at the tip of each triangular point. i didn't see it for long but long enough in the low light of the city to tell its shape (triangular) color (grey/blue) and that it had no identifying marks on its underside, i was not able to see it's top side as the complex is l shaped and it passed beyond my line of sight. the object made no noise what so ever. i have seen many things that could have been or were most certainly ufos. i have had them shine blue light on my vehicle as i was driving in the past but this one was the creepiest yet. it didn't even care that it was totally visible. did anyone else see this thing? i keep up on military air craft and this one was none of those that i had heard of. the closest is the navy's new unmanned bomber this thing was probably the right size but i can't believe it would be totally silent (jet engine) and able to move so slow. this thing was blatant. like a big f you guys, i'm here.
content.summary: Low slow moving triangular object.

content.detailedDescription: As i was sitting on my back patio in the morning. i seen a black object in the sky in the distance. it was moving towards me under the clouds. i live near the airport, so at first thought of it as an airplane. when the object got closer i knew it wasn't a plane! i thought maybe a baloon or a huge bird, but as it got even closer i knew it was something else. then it got right above me and could see it was a black circle shaped thing! it was no plane, bird, or baloon! it traveled from the north, moving south then southeast. when it got right above me i ran to get my husband, when we came back outside in a matter of seconds, it was on the other side of the house (front). my husband witnessed the same object but at a further distance. it appeared at moments as if it were tilting back and forth. as we watched it for about another minute or so it began to rise into the clouds out of sight. wonder if anyone else had seen the same object that morning.....
content.summary: Black circle shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I just watched the discovery channel���s show detailing the ufo events near kokomo, in on 4/16/2008. i���m trying to reach glen means to augment his investigation.

on that night i was sitting in my upstairs west-facing den. i heard and felt the boom hit the house. it was much more substantial than any sonic boom i���ve ever experienced. growing up less than 30 miles from a usaf base (grissom), i made it a hobby to learn about military aircraft and i was very much accustomed to sonic booms over the years. this was vastly different than anything i had ever experienced in my 36 years (a feeling apparently shared by hundreds who dialed 911 ��� i being one of them). the best way i can describe the force was to compare it to a giant mattress striking the west-facing side of my house. it was forceful, yet didn���t break windows. there was significant force striking not only the windows, but the west-facing wall as well. it was definitely a shockwave of some sort ��� that i am certain.

it took probably less than 10 seconds for me to run downstairs and check on my family ��� then i immediately looked out my west-facing sliding glass windows. what i saw took my breath away. 

it was a series of white-orange colored lights in sets of five. similar to what hank bolger described in the documentary and similar to what j.T. puterbaugh caught on film; however, they were distinctly different in that they were arranged in a sloped line of five lights alternating in direction and notably, while mr. puterbaugh���s film showed the lights lasting very briefly, with the first extinguishing before the last, the lights i saw were not flickering and appeared and disappeared at about the same time as all the other lights in the grouping of five. very quickly after the first set, sloped in about -20 degrees from left to right, i saw a mirror image of that in another set of 5 lights sloping the opposite direction in almost the exact same area as the first set. this alternating 5 light sloping repeated for about a total of 4 times before ending completely. firstly, i agree with the investigators that these were likely flairs from military aircraft; however, it must be noted it had to be several criss-crossing aircraft to achieve this appearance. i say this mainly because the intervals at which these appeared going directly opposite one-another meant that an aircraft would have to be pulling g-forces beyond human endurance and the flairs would have radiated outward due to the centrifugal forces involved in maneuvering in an s-pattern. i certainly accept these were flairs, but what i saw was notably different than caught on the puterbaugh film, and i maintain was caused by several military aircraft criss-crossing each other. i���m unaware of such a defensive maneuver in modern military aviation, but would be interested to know if this is common.

secondly, as i scanned the night sky i noticed a peculiar ���smoky��� streak coming from the eastern sky going in a straight line westerly terminating just above kokomo. it was much thicker in width than a typical aircraft trail and it was suspended in the air. since the night was very clear i could make out the distinct shape against the night sky. it also very much appeared that the trail originated very high in altitude and ended just above kokomo at a much lower altitude.

lastly, almost directly above kokomo and slightly north, i saw a whitish-blue flashing light of very high-altitude that appeared not be moving at all. i counted 15 seconds while it flashed on and off about 5 times and then simply disappeared. i scanned the skies that night and saw several commercial passenger aircraft and this light wasn���t in any way similar. for one, it was a single light source as opposed to the typical red/green/white on commercial craft. two, it appeared to be at the limits of our atmosphere ��� if such a thing can be determined. i've witnessed satellites in our orbit before and you can always see them moving against the night stars. this object did not appear to move. oddly, of all the events that night, this particular light struck me as the most strange.

i should also note there were no sounds accompanying the light show after the initial shockwave. my best guess is it was a meteor exploding just above kokomo, but it doesn���t explain the military aircraft being in the exact area within 10 seconds of the event. nor does it explain why military exercises are occurring over a small city at low altitudes (defensive exercises and evasive maneuvers no less).

i did not see the strobe lights that dustin cronkhite witnessed, but i did see enough to convince me the ���strings��� of lights were military maneuvers. what i can���t explain (and have yet to hear from other people) is the smoky trail in the night sky and the white/blue pulsating light high in the northern sky.

thank you for your time.

regards,
rob
content.summary: Regarding the well-publicized events near kokomo on 4/16/2008.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 11 2009 a friend and i were star gazing at grand canyon national park about 9:30pm on a clear sky night. it was a clear cloudless night with no moon up. we were looking north toward the big dipper and we both noticed a star-like object moving from the south-to-north sky. it was not a plane as there was no strobe light nor navigation lights. it resemebled a dot (star-like) moving quickly through the sky. my friend said it changed colors, but i didn't view the color change. a few moments later another object flew the same path as the previous object. 

about 10 mintues later i witnessed another anomaly, two star-like objects flying south-to-north in perfect in-line formation (one ahead of the other) at the same speed. these two were about 5-10 degrees to the west of the other two we saw.

i stood and watched these until they dissapeared. 

the planes flying into las vegas and other points southwest of our area clearly had strobe lights and navigation lights. the objects we saw had none of those. simply a star-like object
content.summary: Grand canyon odd sightings.

content.detailedDescription: We; [cms/tg/pid] were camping at leeds reservior in gypsum, co from friday june 12th until sunday june 14th 2009. on the night of saturday june 13th we were sitting around the campfire and we were looking up at the stars, since it has been our first clear sky in like about 2 and a half weeks. anyhow, i (lucas) noticed two very bright lights travelling side by side very slowly across the sky. i pointed it out to my father (louie) and we all stood there and watched. it was 2 very bright lights exactly alligned as if they were on the ends of either side of whatever craft it was . the lights were not blinking, just a very very bright white. we were all watching this for a bout 2 minutes and it stopped moving. i immediatly grabbed the camera but couldn't figure out how to make it shoot video, because i knew the photo wouldn't have picked anything up. i couldn't figure it out. it was just hovering there for about a minute or so and then it began to rotate. it turned so that the lights were now one on top and one underneath, but still maintained the exact same distance between eachother as when they were side by side. it moved up a little then northbound again. then hovered again for about another minute, returned to it's original sideways position, and moved slowly northbound again and just seemed to dissapear in the night sky. we were a little wierded out and excited all at once.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright lights,  slowly moved accross the sky northbound, then stopped and hovered for a minute.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were on my grandmothers house at dinner; aproxximetaly that week my sister needed an injection for her operation so we were leaving at 9 o clock, more or less, and before we made it into the car my mother saw a circle obje ct with flashing ligths above us, it was enormous, at least at our point of view, we really didnt freak out because it was like we were interested, we like ufos investigations and we dont scare easily but it was weird.
after a few minutes we jump in the car and went to the doctor for my sister injection and the hing was there moving in circles left and rigth but not in direction but his body was moving, some dogs passing by bark at the sky and my grandmother, who accompany us, was like esceptic saying that maybe it was some of the games in a nearby park that were making the lights effect, i went to investigate if that was true qhile my sister was battling. the result is that i didnt find any game at the park, tehre was some of em but they were not working so that wasnt the cause.
my grandmother didnt believe me  but my mother know i wasnt lying, after a while she told me to stop seeing that and concetrate in other things.
when we were going back from the doctor it wasnt there any more but i knew what i saw.
content.summary: A circle around object  with fashing ligths.

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing on lake erie, crystal clear calm day over the lake, some light cumulus clouds over both us and canadian shores, no clouds over the lake.  while watching a jet with a noticable contrail fly across the sky i noticed a bright starlike object about 1/4 of the way from the jet to the horizon moving parallel and in sync with the jet without a contrail and no plane like shape. at first i thought it was another plane reflecting sunlight and then realized that it didn't have any plane shape. this continued for about 30 seconds when the object stopped for a about 10 seconds while the jet continued on.  the object then changed course at an angle (no arc) and flew about 3/4 of the way to the northern horizon of the lake where it stopped again.  suddenly the object moved very quickly (at speeds incapable of a plane) back towards the west where it slowed again, stopped and then headed due north out of sight.  there was no sound or contrails at all and i could hear the jets passing at cruising altitude. i took my sunglasses off and checked to make sure there were no reflections.  my friend saw it for only a few seconds before he lost it as he didn't have his prescription glasses on.  i had no difficulty seeing it, it appeared a a star just after daybreak.  but this was mid day and nearly straight over head.  i've never seen anything like this before and i'm confident that it was no normal aircraft. i was really disappointed i had forgot my binoculars in my truck.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object shadowing a jet over lake erie in the middle of the day!

content.detailedDescription:
http://www.Citytv.Com.Co/videos/11784/avistamiento-de-ovni-en-bogota


    this video, will show exactly how was it!!!!!
content.summary: Like in the movies.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a panamanian boy, i am 13 years old i know little bit of english.

i saw 2 static stars high in the sky at a dark night. i saw it above the panama costway [the costway doesn't have high edifications]. i saw it for 5 minutes but one of them disappeared and appeared many times.

1. i was in the park playing with 5 girls before i saw the ufos.

2. i was walking toward my mother before i saw the ufos.

3. i think it was a helicopter.

4. the stars was stactic in the sky but one of them apirse and disapiers many times. 

5. i was strange because i dont know what were this things. i told my mother.

6. i went to my house and stay there
content.summary: I saw 2 static stars high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home looking east into the sky because there were many thunder heads for we were in the middle of a thunderstorm.  i was attracted to a very dark cloud to the east.  i noticed a white triangular object on the right hand corner of the cloud.  i was thinking it must be a cloud within a cloud for it had a glow around it within the black cloud and was slowly desipitating. i thought at the time that is very strange little cloud within that cloud.  i was speaking to my son and he said that there are white triangular ufo's.  he showed me one on the internet.  i said, "thats exactly what it looked like".  just like the pic he showed me.  i was astounded that i actually saw a white one.  i have seen black triangular ones with three lights underneath but this one had the point of the triangle upward instead of seeing it flying flat over my head.  it appeared to be going straight upward. looking like such ^  . it eventually just disappeared. i kept thinking how strange it was but thought it was my imagination and wasn't going to say anything.  my son suggested i report it to mufon.
content.summary: White triangle with outside glow around it.

content.detailedDescription: A chevron shaped crafted appeared the size of a plane in the bootjack area.  was completely silence and stationary.  slowly began to move toward hubbell/tamarack area.  the chevron shape had solid red lights at the point of the chevron, with white lights (solid) behind the red lights towards the back down the middle.  began to move quickly towards town.  i thought it was a small plane or helicopter but it made absolutely no noise and was stationary.  lost site of it when it began to head toward town.
content.summary: A chevron shape appeared the size of a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Saw red light blinking with 'shooting star' falling from bottom of object.  looked at red light for a few seconds.  my girlfriend (who didn't care much) said we should go and we rode off on our bikes.  i kept looking while riding but it disappeared.
content.summary: Red light blinking with 'shooting star' which fell from bottom of object.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside brushing path and then sat down to have a drink.  i always look up to the sky. i watched a plane going over toward liverpool airport when a shining reflection just underneath caught my eye. the object seemed quite far away in the distance at a guess it was probably over liverpool airport.  from the way it was reacting in the sky it seemed to be spinning at a guess a "disc" shape object and i presumed the sun was reflecting on the object.  my house was in the shade by then but could see the sun shining that way.  i thought that a plane couldnt stay in the same place and to me it would be too high up to be a helicopter but it didnt look like that, it semed the whole object was spinning not just the blades.  i've watched the space shuttle go over and that really moves throught the sky but this seemed to stay in the same place.  i wanted to call someone out of the house or get a camera but didnt want to loose sight of it and was trying to work out what it could possibly be when cloud came over and it was gone. it probably only lasted for about 3 minutes from when i noticed it to the cloud coming over. went in to get my daughter and we came out to see if we could see it again but couldnt.  the only thing i can think of that hovers is a helicopter but to me this seemed too far up.  just wondered if anyone else reported something.
content.summary: Spinning disc high up in the sky, sun must have reflected on it as it spun. seemed to stay same place then covered in cloud.

content.detailedDescription: 11:30 am 6/13/09, sitting on porch texting, heard a lound humming noise like engine above my head, looked up and there it was moving slow and flying low. no way around it, this is a ufo.
content.summary: On porch texting there it was.

content.detailedDescription:
Just got off of work and was in the parking lot, was looking up at the sky and noticed a plane or jet ( had normal flashing lights and a few extra flashing white lights in the position as to where the wings would be) was following a bright red/orange spot or light that was staying solid in color. the plane or jet kept a constant distance, the red/orange light would turn rather sharply and the plane would follow, but turning at a more gradual rate. i watched this go on for a couple of minutes as the red/orange light would continue to zig zag and the plane or jet would follow. at one point the plane or jet appeared to get close to the red/orange light and the light quickly increased the distance between them. i watched it go on until i could not see the two any long as they disappeared going north west from south east. there was not any sound to be heard which i am sure was due to the high altitude.
also at arms length the two appeared about 2 inches apart. i just thought this was unusual. i have seen many aircraft in the sky but have never witnessed anything like this. just thought it was strange. thought you would like to hear about it.
content.summary: Seen a jet or plane following a bright orange/red object at seemingly high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight i was out watching the stars again and potographing any thing that might show up. my flash on the camera, which is quite useless in most respects for night time photography has indeed caught several abnormal and fluke photos in the past. who knows what they where, bursts of light, fire flys or whatever could be debunked..But i am facinated on what  the lense has captured in the past. i had taken a series of photos into the same constelation of corona borealis outside of vega and within 5 minutes i heard a thunderous pulsating noise unlike anything i had ever heard before, keep in mind i have been in flight school and do fly so i know all sounds of aircraft. i heard coming from the north a immensley loud pulsating noise and above the tree tops saw an object with red green and blue blinding lights. it rotated just above me and i tried to take photos the entire time but mone would show what i saw. it was beautiful and spectacular..It was very big and larger than a normal aircraft..It was not anything i have ever known in pilot school and did not obey our flight pattern above our airspace. it was a free moving object and very powerful. i dont know what i saw but it was magnificient and i felt the really knew i was watching. what i saw was so powerful and unique. i would never dispute it as being nothing less than abnormal from what we know
content.summary: Very close bright red green blue with pulsating loud noise and rotating.

content.detailedDescription: I saw lights falling from a light that hovered in the sky crazy [cms/tg/pd]
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light in the sky.
